content: display your ever-growing enamel pin collection on this knitted wall hanging work from the bottom up before knitting the last row onto a dowel or stick then hang on the wall to show off the pins that make you smile most size 10 25 cm tall 7 17 cm wide notions * 2 stitch markers * 1/4 dowel approx 10 5 long or a thin stick * tassel maker optional * needle for adding fringe optional yarn 70 yards of worsted weight yarn sample shown in manos del uruguay maxima worsted weight 100% merino wool 219 yards/100 g in sand
